doc.field: - Businessland Inc is raising 50 mln dlrs via an offering of convertible subordinated debentures due 2007 with a 5-1/2 pct coupon and par pricing, said lead manager Shearson Lehman Brothers Inc. The debentures are convertible into the company's common stock at 20/50 dlrs a share, representing a 25.19 pct premium over the stock price when terms on the debt were set. Non-callable for two years, the debt is rated B-3 by Moody's Investors Service Inc. The issue was increased from an initial offering of 40 mln dlrs.
